mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT to_char(mem_bir, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS mem_bir, mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_zip, mem_add1, mem_add2, mem_hp, mem_mail, mem_gender, mem_del_yn FROM member WHERE ORDER BY mem_id DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{paging.firstRow} AND #{paging.lastRow};
SELECT mem_bir , mem_id , mem_pass , mem_name , mem_zip , mem_add1 , mem_add2 , mem_hp , mem_mail , mem_job , mem_gender , mem_del_yn FROM member a WHERE a.mem_id=#{memId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE member SET mem_del_yn='Y' WHERE mem_id=#{memId}
